txt.en: 'Let us see which, if any, foreman had a worker accident yesterday.'
You need to return to Othax at Rhakatâb tomorrow to find out if you made the correct choice.
Wait to see if you won.
It is a new day. Make your way to Othax in Rakhatâb to see if you were correct that the master of workers' charges had a worker's accident.
Choose the right foreman
You chose wisely
Choose the wrong foreman
Provide your wager to Othax to enter the daily Dead Pool.
You chose poorly
Give a <rgb=#00FF00>Bag of Silver Coins</rgb> to Othax to place your wager
You chose poorly
Check if you won
'All right, I will mark this down. Come back tomorrow to see if you won.'
You should go see if you won the pool
You chose the master of workers as the foreman that will have a work incident.
Visit Othax after 24 hours expire
'If you submit this choice, you will bet that the master of workers' charges will have an accident today. Come back tomorrow to see if you were right.'
Othax checks his notes
Speak with Othax at Rakhatâb
Dead Pool - Master of Workers
